title: Governor of Blackness Castle
text: The Governor of Blackness Castle was a military officer who commanded the fortifications at <a href="Blackness%20Castle">Blackness Castle</a>, a Scottish fortress on the <a href="Firth%20of%20Forth">Firth of Forth</a>. Held by the Crown since 1453, Blackness saw military use until 1912 and a brief revival during the <a href="First%20World%20War">First World War</a>.
